messages.title: A fresh start for the Berwick-upon-Tweed Constituency
messages.content: We think Berwick needs a fresh start - we'll be voting for Alan Strickland on May 6th.

contactInformation.address: Labour Campaign Centre: 1 Hope Terrace, Alnwick NE66 1AJ

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet proudly supports local businesses - Printed by Azure Printing, Pegswood Industrial Estate, Pegswood, Morpeth NE71 6HZ - Designed and printed at small businesses in Northumberland - Promoted by Bill Grisdale on behalf of Alan Strickland, both at 1 Hope Terrace, Alnwick NE66 1AJ
